results.title: Local effect of simvastatin combined with different osteoconductive biomaterials and collagen sponge on new bone formation in critical defects in rat calvaria  1
results.text_hl: In the histometric analysis ( Fig. 2 ), the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SVT@@@ showed to increase the bone formation in @<m>DISEASE_Critical_Illness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016638 @@@CSDs@@@ when combined with all the bone substitutes tested (p<0.05).

results.title: The effect of local simvastatin application on critical size defects in the diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: The local @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ application enhanced healing of the @DISEASE_Bone_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone defects@@@ in the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model @<m>DISEASE_Critical_Illness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016638 @@@CSDs@@@.

results.title: Evaluating early administration of the hydroxymethylglutaryl-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin in the prevention and treatment of delirium in critically ill ventilated patients (MoDUS trial): study protocol for a randomized controlled trial
